Articles.Content:
This is rediculous i know, but what if you had a computer with infinite proccesing power?

What would happen if you crashed a space station the size of the mun into the real mun, and the real mun had physics?

What would be the outcome?
I don't know. Nice double post. Goodbye.

Well what do you think?

Chances are that the space station had a lower density than the Mun (it's not a solid ball of rock), so the mun would win. Not without huge damage. However, it would cause nowhere near as much damage as an asteroid with the same mass as the space station, as the space station's weight is spread out evenly. They'd probably just crash together, make a big boom and meteor shower over earth, causing hundreds or millions of deaths and maybe the extinction of humankind (if there was a big enough chunk flying down). Eventually the remains of both bodies would meld and become the Moon again- although with a higher metal content.
